workshoptitle: Build Intelligent Content Applications at cloud speed with Oracle WebCenter & Oracle APEX

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides detailed guide to set up Records on WebCenter Content Server

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Setup WCC Environment
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Initialize WCC Environment
tutorials.description: This lab provides detailed guide to initialize the workshop environment

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Setup APEX Application
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to configure disposition rules for records that gets triggered due to the occurrence of the event

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Create New RFP Document
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to configure disposition rules for records that gets triggered due to the occurrence of the event

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Update Documents for Section Types
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to configure disposition rules for records that gets triggered by a custom trigger based on the time defined.

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Review and Approve Section Type Documents for RFP
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to configure disposition rules for records that get triggered by the occurrence of the event and waits for certain retention period before acting on the records.

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Merge Section Documents to create RFP Response
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to set up legal holds on records to prevent them from disposition.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
